medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 15 months before presentation, following a diagnosis of deep venous thrombosis and pulmonary embolism. These included persistent cough and dyspnea on exertion after 3 months of treatment. The patient also reported an 18 kg weight loss over the last 3 months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of venous thromboembolism, hypothyroidism, and seizure disorder.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had diabetes; no family history of pulmonary disease, lung cancer, pulmonary embolism, or deep venous thrombosis.
medical_history.social_history: Resides in New England; traveled to Florida in the year prior to evaluation. Does not smoke tobacco, drink alcohol, or use illicit drugs.
